siteInfo.name: Palmetto Epoxy
siteInfo.author: Palmetto Epoxy
siteInfo.description: Palmetto Epoxy - Professional Epoxy Flooring Services in Bluffton, South Carolina
siteInfo.keywords: palmetto epoxy, bluffton, south carolina, epoxy flooring, professional services

services.name: Residential
services.description: Enhance your home with durable, stylish epoxy floors tailored to any room.

services.name: Commercial
services.description: Upgrade your business space with sleek, resilient commercial-grade epoxy flooring.

services.name: Paver Sealing
services.description: Protect and beautify your pavers with our professional sealing services.

services.name: Driveway Coating
services.description: Boost curb appeal and durability with our specialized driveway coating solutions.

services.name: Epoxy Garage Floors
services.description: Transform your garage with our high-performance, spill-resistant epoxy floors.

services.name: Concrete Polishing
services.description: Bring out the natural beauty of your concrete with our expert polishing services.

routes.name: Home
routes.title: Palmetto Epoxy
routes.description: Transform your space with Palmetto Epoxy! We specialize in creating beautiful, durable epoxy floors that add value and functionality to any space. Contact us for custom designs and fast, efficient installation.

routes.name: Services
routes.title: Palmetto Epoxy - Services
routes.description: Let Palmetto Epoxy redesign your space, no matter the space.  We provide services to both residential and commercial spaces, paver sealing, driveway coating, epoxy garage floors, and concrete polishing.  Set the standard with Palmetto Epoxy!

routes.name: Projects
routes.title: Palmetto Epoxy - Projects
routes.description: Flip through a collection of completed projects from Palmetto Epoxy. Examples include local residential and commercial coatings, floors, polishing, and paver sealing applications in the Bluffton South Carolina area.

routes.name: FAQs
routes.title: Palmetto Epoxy - FAQs
routes.description: Palmetto Epoxy is a family owned business, run by Dennis and Martha Aberle, committed to making sure our customers are always satisfied. We're proud to serve the South Carolina Lowcountry, including Bluffton, Hilton Head, Hardeeville, Okatie, Ridgeland, and Beaufort.
